modules.name: Ronda
modules.description: Generate 4 ramp LFO's at different frequency ratios, with optional sync and phase offsets

modules.name: RondaEx
modules.description: Add attenuverters and polyphonic outputs to Ronda

modules.name: Jab
modules.description: A gate inverter, gate-to-trigger, and gate-to-latch with a momentary pushbutton
